body.name: SEVEN WARRIOR L Shaped Gaming Desk with LED Lights & Power Outlets, 63” Reversible Corner Desk with Storage Shelf, Computer Desk with Monitor Stand, Gaming Table with Cup Holder, with Hooks, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 2 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: BIFMA LEVEL certifies furniture products by reviewing corporate, facility, and product manufacturing processes against environmental impact, health and wellness, and social responsibility criteria. LEVEL 1

features: 【Powerful Charging Station】The L shaped gaming desk includes a built-in power strip with 4-Outlet & 2 USB Ports & 1 Type C Port, which can easily charge smart phones, computer, tablet, notebook or gaming gears and provide power for up to 7 devices.

【Cool & Smart LED Lights】The gaming desk comes with RGB LED light, remote control via APP, 12 modes for your to choose. The LED light color can vary through APP Control and create a unique gaming atmosphere. It features memory function which keeps the LED lights staying on last mode when turned on.

【User Friendly Design】The L shaped corner desk allows for reversible installation. The 2-tier storage shelves can place left or right as your needs or preference. The gaming desk is equipped with full monitor stand that offers more space to store your equipment and allows you to sit with better posture. The cup holder and headphone hook keep your drinks and headphones right at your fingertips.
【Ample Storage Space】L Shaped Desk dimensions are 19.7"D x 63"W x 29.8"H. The 2-tier storage shelves offer ample storage space for host computer, Pads, books, files and other supplies.
【More Stability & Sturdy】 The heavy-duty Z-shaped legs offer more stability. Adjustable leg pads ensure the table keeps a sturdy construction even on uneven ground without wobbling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gaming Desk That Checks All the Boxes: SEVEN WARRIOR L Shaped Gaming Desk
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SEVEN WARRIOR L Shaped Gaming Desk, and I must say it has been a fantastic addition to my gaming setup. This desk offers not only a sleek and stylish design but also a range of features that make it perfect for any avid gamer.First and foremost, the assembly process was a breeze. The desk came with clear instructions and all the necessary hardware, making it easy to put together. Within a short amount of time, I had a fully functional gaming desk ready to use. This hassle-free assembly was a pleasant surprise.One of the standout features of this desk is its sturdiness. The construction feels solid and stable, providing a reliable surface for all my gaming activities. Whether I'm vigorously moving my mouse or typing furiously on the keyboard, the desk remains steady, without any wobbling or shaking. This sturdiness gives me the confidence to focus on my gameplay without any distractions.The desk's spacious L-shaped design is a boon for gamers. It offers ample surface area for multiple monitors, gaming consoles, and other gaming accessories. The included monitor stand is a thoughtful addition, allowing me to position my screens at eye level for optimal viewing comfort. The storage shelf provides convenient space to keep my gaming essentials within arm's reach, keeping my gaming area organized and clutter-free.One of the standout features of this gaming desk is the LED lights. The vibrant LED lighting adds a cool and immersive ambiance to my gaming setup. It creates a dynamic and visually appealing environment, enhancing the overall gaming experience. Additionally, the built-in power outlets are a game-changer. They allow me to easily connect and power my gaming devices without the hassle of searching for available outlets.The desk also comes with a cup holder and hooks, which are incredibly useful for keeping my drinks and headphones within easy reach. These small yet thoughtful additions contribute to the overall convenience and functionality of the desk.In terms of aesthetics, the black finish of the desk gives it a sleek and modern look that complements any gaming setup. The materials used are of good quality, and the desk is built to withstand the rigors of gaming.Overall, the SEVEN WARRIOR L Shaped Gaming Desk is a standout product that delivers on its promises. It is easy to assemble, offers excellent sturdiness, and provides a range of features that make it ideal for gaming. If you're in search of a gaming desk that combines style, functionality, and durability, I highly recommend considering this desk. It has truly enhanced my gaming experience and exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good desk for the money
reviews.reviewText: I got this desk in yesterday and I was surprised at how detailed the instructions were. The assembly was a breeze, all the parts were labeled and numbered, and the finished product was very sturdy and good looking.I needed a desk like this for gaming and study while also fitting in the limited space I had.The carbon fiber is very well done as well, I like the feel. Leds are very bright and easy tocontrol with the app. Overall, I would give this desk 5/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son for Christmas. Putting it together didn't take longer than an hour and it's STURDY! It's already been over a month and there have been zero issues. Everything fit and lined up perfectly! He also loved the addition of the LED lights and the extra outlets connected to the desk. Cupholder holds drinks perfectly and doesn't bend under the weight of his glass cups. He has every PlayStation console and there's room to store all of them on this desk. Along with two big-sized monitors, games, a Wii and an Xbox! I'm so impressed with how many places you can store things without it being over crowded. Overall, this is a 10/10. Absolutely recommend if you're looking for a gaming desk!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Son got it for Christmas and loves it. The lights add an extra cool factor. It seems sturdier than it looks. Easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Awesome Design, Easy Assembly, Decent Quality light strip
reviews.reviewText: Great for the price. Very clean wire wise if you use the wire holders. Looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Has everything I need looks sleek and easy to put together took just shy of 2 hours! Feels sturdy and has a nice texture to the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decently quality desk for my son's bedroom, but a bit high for him.
reviews.reviewText: Height was a little much for my son - would be nice if the legs were adjustable. We purchased a third party sliding keyboard shelf to go under the desk, but the monitor shelf places the screen at an ergonomically incorrect position for him. On the plus side he loves the color changing LEDs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, easy assembly, L side significantly shorter
reviews.reviewText: Great quality desk, that’s reversible and very simple to assemble. (2 is recommended as there’s a few parts that are annoying with 1). Favorite parts are the L side of the desk being significantly shorter, so it can fit in tight spots and the setup on the LEDS is very nice. Also a lot to the desk is optional (cup holder, headset hanger, monitor stands, power strip)A con that’s yet to affect me is the power strip, the power strip feels and looks very cheap. I wouldn’t put a ton of trust into it if you want to run everything off that. I’ll probably end up swapping it out myself later on with a quality named one. A bit pricier than others, but great desk!

reviews.reviewTitle: Incredible quality and easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, the quality of items on Amazon has plummeted in recent years, so buying anything on here is always a roulette. I decided to gamble and am so incredibly glad I did. Not only did I assemble this thing by myself in under an hour, but the instructions are clear and concise and the desk itself is SOLID. It was shipped in amazing packing with bumpers on the corners of the main part of the desk. And dense foam inserts buffering it on all sides. No hardware was missing and it even came with a full sized screw driver! It went together so easily that i found myself questioning if i was doing something wrong. It’s light weight but offers an impressive amount of space. The monitor shelves are at the perfect height and are wide enough for most monitor stands. There were no issues with holes mismatching and once it was together it was sturdy and easy enough to move by myself. 10/10 on this desk. Well worth every cent. If you’re a gamer in need of an upgrade, start here.

reviews.reviewTitle: One of my favorite buys if the year, will not regret it
reviews.reviewText: The L Shaped Gaming Desk is a celestial piece in the gaming cosmos! Impeccable quality meets futuristic design, and the LED lights are like a party for my peripherals. Setting it up was a breeze – a dream for the tech-challenged. The 55" expanse is a gaming kingdom, and the built-in power outlets are the ultimate crown jewels. It's not just a desk; it's a gaming sanctuary. Top-tier quality and ease of setup make this a five-star marvel!
Super sturdy, easy to assemble and looks great!
It's a light easy to put it together

This is a great compact Computer desk -I have a small gaming system and I am 6'4 and fit comfortably at this desk. I find the cup holder to be a great added feature and the lighting is great so I can game while my partner sleeps.
